title: La Fin du Salariat Majoritaire
text: 2036 : Le salariat devient minoritaire. Moins d'un actif sur deux dispose d'un contrat de travail classique.
original_prompt:
Create a portrait A5 card design with ALL text elements visible and readable.

=== REQUIRED TEXT ON CARD (must appear exactly as written) ===
CATEGORY (small, top corner): "TRAVAIL & STATUTS"
TITLE (large, bold, prominent): "La Fin du Salariat Majoritaire"
DESCRIPTION (medium size, below illustration): "2036 : Le salariat devient minoritaire. Moins d'un actif sur deux dispose d'un contrat de travail classique."

=== CARD LAYOUT ===
- Top left corner: Category label "TRAVAIL & STATUTS" in small caps
- Top center: Large bold title "La Fin du Salariat Majoritaire"
- Center: The illustration described below
- Bottom: Description text "2036 : Le salariat devient minoritaire. Moins d'un actif sur deux dispose d'un contrat de travail classique."

=== ILLUSTRATION ===
An asymmetrical balance scale. On the high side, a small group of grey-suited office workers at desks. On the low side, a diverse crowd of freelancers connected by glowing digital lines, holding creative and technical tools.

=== STYLE ===
- Retro-futuristic isometric illustration, clean lines, vintage infographic feel
- Dominant color palette: Deep petrol blue (#1F3A3D)
- Background: Aged textured cream/off-white paper (#F5F5F2)
- Typography: Bold sans-serif for title, elegant serif for description
- The card should look like an official document from 2036
- All text must be in French and clearly legible
- Portrait orientation, A5 proportions
